answers.answer: I'm pretty sure protein is classified in the gestational diabetes category. But I'd like to know the same thing about high bp because I have it lol
No I had high bp and protein in my wee and I dont have pre eclampsia! Thats severe normally when ur bp is threw the roof and if soo u would b in hospital on bed rest!!
im being monitored twice a week now so hopefully nothing will come of itstill got 6 weeks left x
im being monitored twice a week now so hopefully nothing will come of itstill got 6 weeks left x
Not to long left,  do u know what ur having? :-)

Wen i haf pre elcampsia wiv 1st i swelld like a balloon had alot of protein in wee my blood wos so high the alarms wer goin of n i had increased fluid arnd baby wiv second i had high blood pressure n protein they said it wis early signs of it i had it frm middle
i havent swollen up or anything, just had blurry eyesight and headache, and abit of protein. my bp was high but has always come back down. no i dont kno what im having :) wanted a surprise :) x

Wow thats mad it seems everyone is finding out these days im having surprise to , I wouldnt worry to much especially if ur bp came bk down it dosent sound like preeclampsia. I know someone that had it and believe me they knew about it swelled up and  had severely high bp and was admitted to hospital for along time in pregnancy!
i think we will be ok. just cant wait to have this baby now :) my friend had preeclampsia and got induced at 30 weeks and her face swelld up so bad so im not too worried.

I had early signs of it in my last few wks of pregnancy it would go up and down so they put me on bedrest at home then about a wk and a half before my due date I went for my appt and had gained 10lbs in 2wks so they monitored me for a while and sent me home with a 24hr urine thing (i didnt have any protein in my urine at my appt) I had to collect my urine for 24hrs then take it back while waiting for my results they decide to induce me anyways cause they didnt want to chance it cause of the sudden weight gain so I went in the next morning at exactly 39wks and was induced they told me I had 278mg of protein in my urine and anything 300 or above puts you at risk for seizures and other stuff so im glad they induced me when they did and I didnt get it til the end if my pregnancy sorry so long but they'll probably just keep an eye on you and if it dont change put you on bedrest (which does help most the time) and go from there if nothing still doesnt change
Oh and I had no swelling or anything that indicated I had it either

im getting monitored twice a week so i guess they will find if i get anything. bed rest i dnt mind as ftm and havent gotta work now anyway. i just want this baby to stay in there as long as pos :) thanku for ur posts ladies.
Well youre almost there anyways so yall should be as long as it dont get too bad good luck and put yourself on bedrest :) so it dont get that way

title: preeclampsia??
